availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles W. Barnett (Union County, Kentucky, student and farm family member)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of John K. Barnett and Lucretia Barnett. Student in Union County in 1850. Member of farming family in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 510B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 403.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Uniontown, p. 397A.
